name: cognitive-bias-commands
description: Cognitive bias awareness and mitigation commands for UX

commands.name: bias-checklist
commands.description: Run a user flow or UI copy against common cognitive bias risks (anchoring, choice overload, confirmation bias, decoy, framing, loss aversion, social proof, scarcity). Returns risks and mitigations.

parameters.name: user_flow_description
parameters.description: Description of the user flow or journey.

parameters.name: ui_copy_or_screens
parameters.description: Relevant UI copy or screen descriptions.

mitigations: Show real inventory or remove scarcity copy

commands.name: bias-choice-architecture
commands.description: Improve choice presentation (defaults, grouping, progressive disclosure) and flag dark patterns.

parameters.name: choice_context
parameters.description: Context where the user must choose (e.g., plan selection, add-ons).

recommendations: Clear default; allow easy switch; show comparison table
dark_pattern_warnings: Avoid decoy tier that only makes middle option look better

commands.name: bias-copy-review
commands.description: Review copy for framing, anchoring, and scarcity/social proof language. Suggest neutral or user-empowering alternatives.

example_input.copy_text: Don't miss out! 10,000+ users signed up.

example_output.name: bias-mitigation-table
example_output.description: Return a concise table: Bias | UX risk | Mitigation for requested biases or product type. Uses cognitive-bias-codex.

parameters.name: bias_names_or_product_type
parameters.description: Bias names (e.g., anchoring, scarcity) or product type (e.g., ecommerce, SaaS).
